Uses of Interface
net.sf.jasperreports.engine.fonts.FontFace

  • Packages that use FontFace 
    Package Description
    net.sf.jasperreports.engine.export
    Provides utility classes for exporting reports to various popular formats such as PDF, HTML, RTF, CSV, Excel, DOCX, PPTX, ODT, ODS, XML, Text, etc.
    net.sf.jasperreports.engine.fonts
    Provides support for font extensions.
